trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.

Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> from XML documents that represent RSS 2.0 feeds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 인스턴스를 serialize하고 RSS 2.0 피드를 나타내는 XML 문서로부터 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 인스턴스를 만들 때 이 클래스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> formatter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>로부터 파생시킨 클래스를 serialize하려는 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> 포맷터를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and serialize it to RSS 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed>를 만들고 이를 RSS 2.0으로 serialize하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
The following code shows how to create an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance and read in an RSS syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> 인스턴스를 만들고 RSS 배포 피드를 읽는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to serialize.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
The following example shows how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 이 생성자를 호출하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to be serialized.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
Use this constructor to specify a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to instantiate when a syndication feed is read in.
trans-unit.target: 배포 피드를 읽어들일 때 인스턴스화할 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 파생 클래스를 지정하려면 이 생성자를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 이 생성자를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to serialize.
A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification.
The default value is <see langword="true" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.

If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with in the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` 매개 변수가 `true`인 경우 Atom 1.0 사양에서 정의되지만 RSS 2.0 사양에서 정의되지 않은 모든 요소는 Atom 1.0 네임스페이스 내부에서 serialize됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 이 생성자를 호출하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.CanRead%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.CanRead%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.
A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> instance.
The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 인스턴스와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 파생 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: serialization 중에 특성 확장을 유지할지 여부를 지정하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 기본값은 `true`입니다.

trans-unit.source: Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 특성 확장은 RSS 2.0 사양에 정의되지 않은 XML 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 serialization 중에 이러한 특성을 쓸지 여부를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로 이 속성은 RSS 2.0 피드를 deserialize할 때 `AttributeExtensions` 인스턴스의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 속성 내부에 알 수 없는 특성을 보존할지 여부를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: serialization 중에 요소 확장을 유지할지 여부를 지정하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 기본값은 `true`입니다.

trans-unit.source: Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 요소 확장은 RSS 2.0 사양에 정의되지 않은 XML 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 serialization 중에 이러한 요소를 쓸지 여부를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로 이 속성은 RSS 2.0 피드를 deserialize할 때 `ElementExtensions` 인스턴스의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 속성 내부에 알 수 없는 요소를 보존할지 여부를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
Reads an RSS 2.0 syndication feed from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 메서드를 사용하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> used to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
Reads a syndication item from <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance using the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새로 생성된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 인스턴스와 연결된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter>에 추가되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance to use to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances.
A value that specifies whether all of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances have been read from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
Reads in a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instances are not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새로 생성된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 인스턴스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 인스턴스와 연결된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter>에 추가되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: Atom 1.0 네임스페이스 내부에서 확장을 serialize할지 여부를 지정하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성의 기본값은 `true`입니다.

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, any properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace otherwise these properties are not serialized.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성이 `true`이면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 클래스의 속성 중 RSS 2.0 형식으로 표현할 수 없는 모든 속성이 Atom 1.0 네임스페이스 내에서 serialize되고, 그렇지 않으면 이러한 속성이 serialize되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.
Sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.
Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> method.
<see langword="Null" />.
Override this method to return your own schema.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 고유의 스키마를 반환하려면 이 메서드를 재정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method.
Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
The syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 포맷터에서 사용하는 배포 버전입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]는 Atom 1.0 및 RSS 2.0 배포 버전을 지원합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to write.
The base URI for the feed.
Writes the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
Override this method to change the way a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>을 쓰는 방법을 변경하려면 이 메서드를 재정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances to write.
The base URI for the feed.
Writes a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
Override this method to change the way a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 개체 컬렉션을 쓰는 방법을 변경하려면 이 메서드를 재정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.

Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
The following code shows how to create a syndication feed and use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> to write the feed to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드에서는 배포 피드를 만들고 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter>를 사용하여 피드를 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>에 쓰는 방법을 보여 줍니다.
